short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let you get rid of mouse when browsing websites!.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 1.2.1. Support input and textarea along with links(a tag)!
---
Get rid of mouse when browsing on web! 

Don't you feel using mouse increase your shoulder pain? You're on the right spot! Mouseless offers mouseless experience when you are web surfing. It can keep your both hands relaxing on the keyboard without moving around between keyboard and mouse like a bee. Especially useful for reading article by article on news sides like Techcrunch, WJS, or NYT.

Simply press "Shift+Alt + n". Mouseless will generate keys for all links and input bar on your current viewport. Press the key one by one, and then it will follow that link or focus on input bar for your next action!

Press "Shift+Alt + n" again will close it. Super easy!
